Events.Text: Hi can you help me reserve a room?
You remember that your friend recommended the Hilton Hotel. Tell the assistant you've changed your mind and want to stay at Hilton Hotel. [instruction 1 of 5]
Where would you like
What hotel would you like to stay at?
Hyatt!  I am a member of their rewards club!  I'm so close to a free stay!
may i have your name
May I have your name, please?
Yes it is Angela.

Actually, you recall that your friend stayed at Hilton Hotel in another town. However you've read on a blog that the Old Town Inn is by long and far the most authentic one. Tell the assistant you've changed your mind and want to stay at Old Town Inn. [instruction 2 of 5]
dates of your stay
Hi Angela, what dates did you want me to check at the Hyatt?
You know what I just remembered a blog I read about the Old Town Inn.  I really want to stay there now that I think about it.
Talk to the assistant about this great travel blog that you rely on and that its never let you down on your journeys. Be creative! [instruction 3 of 5]
Of course, what dates should I check for you at the Old Town Inn?
Of course, what dates should I check for you at the Old Town Inn?
Hmmm let me think on that one for a minute.  Sorry I'm distracted by this amazing blog.

You just received a text from your partner saying: 'Hey, my brother invited us to his wedding in London on the 24th and I already booked us a flight for the 6th!' Tell the assistant you would like to change your reservation to 13th-20th the following month. [instruction 4 of 5]
Some of those travel blog photographs are incredible, really make you feel like you're there
Some of those travel blog photographs are incredible, really make you feel like you're there
Definitely!  Ok my brother just invited me to his wedding so that helps me decide.  Let's make reservations for the 13th-20th.

Tell the assistant you don't really want to go to London because your partner's brother is a bit of a show-off, but obviously you'll be going to the wedding. Finish the booking and bring the conversation to an end. [instruction 5 of 5]
Old town inn available
The Old Town Inn is available for those dates, should I reserve a room for you?
Yeah that would be great!  I really don't want to go to London.  My brother is such a show off.  Oh well I'll go for the free food though.
Reservation confirmed
OK, I've successfully completed this Hotel booking for you!
Oh great.  Thank you for all your help.  I hope you're getting paid time and a half for working on a holiday today!
Is there anything
Is there anything else I can do for you today?
Nope I'm good!  Thanks for all your help!
Thank you and goodbye
Thank you and goodbye.

Scenario.UserTask: You want to reserve a room at the Hyatt Hotel from May 6th to 24th. Your name is Angela. Please do not make a custom request, and it is ok if no room is available - just say goodbye in this case.
Scenario.WizardTask: Help the user reserve a hotel room. (You can find the video tutorial under https://youtu.be/L7QpscLPTFM, in case you want to watch it again.)

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant reserve your hotel?
Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
